participant_1.background:
I enjoy exercising for long hours.
I spend my free time reading plays.
I also write diet cookbooks.
I own my own very successful dieting business.
I have two cats and a dog.

participant_2.background:
I like to sing folk songs.
I adopted a stray cat recently.
I like making my own clothing.
I am worried about the environment.
My mother was an army nurse.

content.text: It's nice to meet you! What are you interested in?
I like to sing folk songs, make my own clothing, and adopt stray cats.
That's really cool! I love singing too, but I'm not very good at it.
Me neither! But it's still fun to sing, right?
Yeah, it is. I also love making my own clothes. It's so much fun to be creative and make something that's unique.
I agree! I love being able to wear something that no one else has.
I'm glad we have something in common! What's your favorite kind of folk song?
I love all kinds of folk songs, but my favorite are the ones that tell stories.
Me too! I love how folk songs can capture the essence of a place or a time.
Exactly! They're so much more than just songs, they're pieces of history.
I agree. They're a way for us to connect with our past.
I'm glad you feel that way! I love folk songs, and I'm glad that you do too.
